choicegroup.label: Do you expect the diagonal members of the truss that are highlighted in green to be in tension, compression, or both tension and compression due to downward loads as shown by the black arrows?

div.p: The diagonals will be in compression and the vertical members will be in tension (the diagonals need to balance out the tension in the verticals).
